s: I bought this from 7IDP I love their products and find them much better than all of the other brands out there. The packaging that these came in was super cool reminds me of an apple style packaging, very minimalistic. I thought these would be a slimmer style knee pad but they are beefy reminds ...

t: Amazon.com: 7iDP Flex Body Protective Gear : Beauty & Personal Care
s: My only complaint is that it offers absolutely no protection for your ribs... Too bad cause it would've been perfect. Today I took a hard hit and guess what... I've got a bruised rib because it had no protection there. 7idp is a new brand for me but I absolutely love it.
